author: Kat Bailey
title: Remedy's Same Lake Shares Max Payne Cast Photo That's a Warm but Wistful Reunion After 22 Years
text:
Some 22 years after it first released, the cast of Max Payne recently reunited for a strange but brilliant Alan Wake 2 moment, absent one key member.
Remedy co-founder Sam Lake captured the moment in a photo posted to X/Twitter, referring to the cast as "family and friends." The group included Jani Niipola (Alex Balder), Carol Kiriakos (Mona Sax), Lake's mother and father (Nicole Horne and Alfred Woden respectively), Aki Järvilehto (BB), and of course Lake himself, who was the original face of Max Payne.
Max Payne reunion 22 y later in Alan Wake 2. I invited family and friends to dance in the AW2 short film. @janiniipola (MP1 Alex Balder), @CarolKiriakos (MP1 Mona Sax), my mother (MP1 Nicole Horne), my father (MP1 Alfred Woden), @akijarvilehto (MP1 B.B.) @alanwake @remedygames pic.twitter.com/bVk7tvctdR
— Sam Lake (@SamLakeRMD) January 5, 2024 Absent from the gathering was James McCaffrey, the voice of Max Payne, who died in December . His final role was Alan Wake 2, where he played Alex Casey. Lake paid tribute to McCaffrey at the time, calling him a "lovely man and a dear friend."
Spoilers for Alan Wake 2

author: Laurent BLANCHARD
title: Région - Darmanin intransigeant avec l'imam de Bagnols-sur-Cèze expulsé en Tunisie
text: L’affaire ne s’est pas éternisée. On le présumait depuis dimanche dernier, jour où Gérald Darmanin a lancé une procédure d’expulsion à son encontre.Auteur d’un prêche anti-français, où il qualifiait notamment \"le drapeau tricolore de satanique\", quelques jours plus tôt, à la mosquée At-Tawba de Bagnols-sur-Cèze, l’imam de nationalité tunisienne, Mahjoub Mahjoubi disait, lui-même, mardi, \"se préparer à toute éventualité\", sans s’y résigner, toutefois, évoquant \"un lapsus\" dans ses propos. Une défense fragile et fort peu persuasive. Celle-ci a vite ployé sous le poids d’éléments à charge jugés bien trop éloquents pour être minimisés. D’autant plus que l’intéressé était déjà dans la ligne de mire des autorités, depuis plusieurs semaines. Un premier signalement était lié à ses activités de chef d’entreprise dans le BTP, alors qu’il avait été condamné, voici neuf ans, à une interdiction de gestion, jusqu’en 2030. Par la suite, d’autres avaient déjà eu trait au contenu de certains de ses prêches. Celui de la semaine dernière a été celui de trop.Darmanin met en avant la loi immigrationCe jeudi, à la mi-journée, Mahjoubi, qui était visé par une enquête préliminaire pour \"apologie de terrorisme\", a d’abord été interpellé, à son domicile de Bagnols, par la police, avant d’être transféré vers un centre de rétention administrative situé en région parisienne, dans le cadre d’un arrêté d’expulsion, opération exécutée dans la soirée. \"Aucun appel à la haine ne restera sans réponse\", avait promis Gérald Darmanin sur X. Ce jeudi soir, le ministre de l’Intérieur a également rappelé que cette décision n’aurait pas pu être actée \"sans la loi sur l’immigration qui rend la France plus forte\". \"Nous ne laisserons rien passer\", a-t-il de nouveau posté sur X. Contacté par nos soins, Me Samir Hamroun, le conseil de Mahjoub Mahjoubi, s’était élevé contre cet arrêté d’expulsion qu’il qualifiait de \"complètement disproportionné\".\"Nous sommes dans un état de stupeur de par la rapidité et la brutalité de la procédure qui a été exercée à l’encontre de monsieur Mahjoubi, confiait l’avocat vauclusien. Il a été interpellé devant ses enfants mineurs et son épouse sans prévenir. En matière des droits des étrangers, c’est une décision inédite dans l’histoire de la Ve République. Même pour Hassan Iquioussen (un imam marocain expulsé par la Belgique, en 2023, pour des propos antisémites et misogynes après avoir été visé par une mesure similaire en France, NDLR), plusieurs mois avaient été nécessaires. Il y a des personnes qui sont réellement dangereuses pour l’intégrité physique de nos compatriotes et qui sont, pourtant, maintenues sur notre territoire. Et là, quelqu’un pour un excès de langage est reconduit chez lui. C’est une décision extrêmement excessive.\" Dans le courant de l’après-midi de ce jeudi, Me Hamroun avait déposé un recours en référé. Mais celui-ci n’étant que suspensif, la procédure s’est donc poursuivie jusqu’à l’expulsion de Mahjoubi. Né à Tunis, ce dernier était arrivé à Roquemaure, à l’âge de 12 ans, en 1986. Le fait de résider en France depuis maintenant trente-huit ans pouvait être un paramètre susceptible d’enrayer le processus de son expulsion, tout comme sa situation familiale, lui qui est père de cinq enfants âgés de 7 à 17 ans. Il n’en a rien été. Mahjoubi a bien été reconduit en Tunisie.

author: Zonebourse
title: Le nombre de centenaires a augmenté de 30 % en Italie au cours de la dernière décennie - Zonebourse
text:
Le nombre de personnes âgées de plus de 100 ans en Italie a augmenté de 30 % au cours des dix dernières années, alors que les taux de natalité ont continué à baisser. Il y aura plus de 22 000 Italiens dans la tranche d'âge comprise entre 100 et 104 ans en 2024, contre un peu plus de 17 000 en 2014, selon un rapport du bureau national des statistiques ISTAT publié jeudi. La grande majorité d'entre eux - 81 % - sont des femmes.
En 2024, 21 super-centenaires (personnes âgées de 110 ans et plus) seront encore en vie, dont un seul homme. Ce chiffre a plus que doublé par rapport à 2009, où il n'y en avait que 10.
Le vieillissement progressif de la population pose des problèmes à l'Italie, où le taux de natalité est l'un des plus bas d'Europe, et pèse lourdement sur les comptes publics en raison des dépenses considérables consacrées aux pensions et aux soins de santé.
La personne la plus âgée en Italie est une femme de 114 ans ; chez les hommes, la personne la plus âgée est de 110 ans, selon l'ISTAT.

author: Josueyzxtn Ampedpages Com
title: Innovative Layout Solutions for Bathroom Remodeling Austin TX
text:
Revitalize Your Home: Specialist Washroom Makeover Solutions
Are you looking to transform your out-of-date washroom into a modern and useful space? Our firm, specializing in expert restroom renovating solutions, is below to revitalize your home and bring your vision to life. Whether you're seeking a total bathroom restoration or a straightforward upgrade, we have the know-how to take care of any project, big or small.
Benefits of Shower Room Improvement
What are the advantages of shower room remodeling? Washroom renovation uses a myriad of advantages for home owners. It enhances the total visual appeals of the room. A well-designed and upgraded bathroom can substantially improve the aesthetic charm of a home, making it a lot more appealing to possible buyers if the building is sold. Furthermore, shower room renovation can greatly enhance the capability and efficiency of the space. By integrating modern-day components and storage options, homeowners can optimize making use of their washroom, making it more convenient and satisfying to utilize. Bathroom makeover permits for the assimilation of energy-efficient features, such as low-flow toilets and LED lighting, which can lead to substantial savings on utility bills. Another noteworthy benefit of bathroom remodeling is the potential for increased home worth. Upgrading the restroom is considered one of one of the most beneficial financial investments in regards to return on investment (ROI) A recently remodeled bathroom can give a feeling of leisure and harmony, producing a spa-like atmosphere that advertises wellness and rejuvenation. On the whole, shower room makeover supplies a series of benefits that can improve the charm, capability, and value of a home.
Planning Your Bathroom Improvement
To effectively prepare your bathroom remodelling, it is important to take into consideration various variables and make notified choices that straighten with your design preferences and budget plan. Prior to diving right into the project, put in the time to evaluate your present washroom layout and recognize any type of problems or locations for renovation. Consider the size and design of the area, along with the capability and circulation of the fixtures and fittings.
Following, determine your renovation objectives and priorities. Do you desire to develop a spa-like hideaway or emphasis on making the most of storage space? Recognizing your preferred end result will aid assist your decision-making process and guarantee that the renovation satisfies your assumptions and requirements.
As soon as you have a clear vision for your new washroom, it's time to develop a spending plan. Think about just how much you agree to invest in products, labor, and any kind of extra expenses that may develop during the improvement. It's important to be realistic and consider unexpected prices that may develop.
Furthermore, research study and collect motivation for your shower room improvement. Look for layout ideas, color design, and products that reverberate with your individual style and preferences. This will help you produce a cohesive and visually attractive room.
Finally, do not forget to seek advice from specialists. Take into consideration collaborating with a restroom remodeling specialist or designer who can offer professional guidance, advice, and aid throughout the preparation and restoration procedure. They can help you

When choosing fixtures and surfaces for your shower room improvement, it is essential to think about a range of choices that align with your design goals and preferences. The coatings and components you select can considerably affect the general look and feel of your restroom, so it is important to choose ones that not only complement your layout visual however also satisfy your practical requirements.
When it concerns components, take into consideration aspects such as toughness, simplicity of maintenance, and water efficiency. Faucets, commodes, and showerheads been available in a variety of designs and surfaces, from sleek modern-day layouts to traditional and traditional alternatives. When selecting components such as sinks and vanities., take right into account the size of your restroom and the quantity of storage area you call for.
Surfaces, on the various other hand, can add the completing touch to your washroom remodelling. Think about the state of mind and atmosphere you want to produce in your washroom - bathroom remodel austin.
Making The Most Of Space and Functionality
To make sure optimum usage of every inch of your restroom, a tactical technique to maximizing area and capability is essential. When it concerns restroom improvement,
Go Hereone of the primary objectives is to make one of the most out of the offered area. This can be attained with cautious preparation and smart design choices.
One means to make the most of area is by utilizing vertical storage space. Mounting tall cabinets or racks can aid to maximize storage space capability without using up important floor room. Additionally, incorporating built-in storage space remedies, such as recessed racks or specific niches, can offer a seamless and reliable way to save toiletries and various other restroom essentials.

In regards to layout, using light colors and reflective surfaces can produce an illusion of room - bathroom remodel austin. Mirrors, specifically, can

Employing an Expert Shower Room Improvement Service
One vital action in achieving a successful bathroom renovation is enlisting the know-how of an expert restroom remodeling service. While several home owners might consider taking on the job themselves, it is very important to acknowledge the various benefits of working with experts for this project.

This guarantees that completion result is not just visually pleasing however sturdy and additionally functional.
Shower room improvements can be intricate and lengthy, calling for various tradespeople and coordinating different tasks. bathroom remodeling austin tx. This permits homeowners to focus on various other crucial facets of their lives while the specialists take treatment of the improvement.
In addition, specialist shower room redesigning solutions commonly have accessibility to a variety of suppliers and sources. This suggests they can supply home owners a substantial choice of products, fixtures, and finishes to pick from, guaranteeing that the outcome matches the home owner's vision and design preferences.
Conclusion
Finally, restroom improvement offers various benefits, such as boosting the functionality and looks of the space. Planning the remodelling very carefully and picking the right fixtures and surfaces are vital for attaining the desired outcomes. Furthermore, making best use of room is essential for producing a practical washroom. Furthermore, bathroom makeover can substantially boost the performance and efficiency of the space. Take right into account the size of your restroom and the quantity of storage room you need when choosing components such as sinks and vanities.
When it comes to bathroom makeover, one of the primary goals is to make the most out of the readily available area.In conclusion, washroom improvement provides numerous advantages, such as improving the functionality and looks of the area. author: 小浪财讯
title: 影视ETF（516620）跌1.62%，半日成交额841.72万元|ETF_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，影视ETF（516620）跌1.62%，报0.971元，成交额841.72万元。影视ETF（516620）重仓股方面， 光线传媒 截止午盘跌3.68%， 芒果超媒 跌0.70%， 完美世界 跌0.65%， 东方明珠 跌0.81%， 万达电影 跌1.06%， 捷成股份 跌1.50%， 视觉中国 跌1.01%， 华策影视 跌0.84%， 奥飞娱乐 跌1.34%， 江苏有线 跌0.89%。
影视ETF（516620）业绩比较基准为中证影视主题指数收益率，管理人为国泰基金管理有限公司，基金经理为王玉、刘昉元，成立（2021-10-20）以来回报为-1.34%，近一个月回报为4.38%。

author: Redacción
title: "Welcome to Earth", la nueva campaña de Salomon que busca reconectar con la naturaleza
text: La marca especializada en deportes de montaña Salomon, en asociación con la agencia de publicidad creativa DDB, ha presentado una nueva campaña "Welcome Back to Earth" (Bienvenidos de nuevo a la Tierra), que busca ampliar la conciencia global entre los consumidores y conectar con audiencias más jóvenes en ciudades clave como San Francisco, Shanghái, Nueva York o París, invitando a las personas a reconectar con la naturaleza. Para despertar el interés de los principiantes en la montaña y, al mismo tiempo, permanecer fiel a su herencia deportiva, Salomon estrenó una serie de vídeos inspiradores filmados en lugares como Liubliana y Triglav en Eslovenia, y Cortina d’Ampezzo y el Lagazuoi en los Dolomitas italianos. Esta serie se ha inspirado en la verdad humana de que estar activo en entornos naturales [mejora significativamente la salud mental](https://www.mundodeportivo.com/running/consejos/20220818/1002141873/trail-running-promueve-salud-mental-revela-estudio-internacional.html), así como el bienestar general, la calidad de vida, la felicidad y la satisfacción vital. Su creador transporta a las montañas a los habitantes de la ciudad sobrecargados de tecnología y les da la bienvenida "de vuelta a la Tierra". Para producir el vídeo Welcome Back to Earth de la marca —así como tres vídeos más para sus categorías de productos para el aire libre, de running y de estilo de vida—, Salomon recurrió a los mejores talentos de la industria, como los directores Martin de Thurah y Elena Petitti di Roreto, junto con el fotógrafo Jake Jones. Por parte de la agencia, la inspiración provino de Alexander Kalchev, director creativo de DDB Paris, en colaboración con el director creativo de Salomon, Jason Israel. Una versión de 30 segundos del vídeo de la marca se transmitió a los espectadores de la Super Bowl LVIII en Nueva York y San Francisco. El vídeo también se retransmitirá en el área de París durante los Juegos Olímpicos de 2024 en la ciudad. En los próximos meses, Salomon presentará los tres vídeos adicionales Welcome Back to Earth de la marca, que tratarán las categorías de aire libre, running y estilo de vida. Scott Mellin, director general de marca Salomon, dijo que "La razón de ser de Salomon es fomentar la mejor versión de cada uno en la práctica de los deportes de montaña. Como la marca más auténtica, innovadora y de primer nivel del mundo para el estilo de vida de los deportes de montaña, tenemos la misión de ser los mejores compañeros para nuestros consumidores cuando se inician o profundizan su relación con las montañas y el aire libre. La conexión digital puede dominar nuestra vida cotidiana, y los vídeos Welcome Back to Earth ilustran el valor innato del tiempo al aire libre para nuestra mente y nuestro cuerpo. Salomon se enorgullece de ofrecer esta invitación a conectar con el aire libre a través de esta campaña". Por su parte, Alexander Kalchev, director creativo DDB París, agregó que "La petición de Salomon fue clara desde el principio: producir una historia de marca poderosa que ilustrase su misión y abordase una necesidad humana del día a día. A nosotros nos pareció un claro llamamiento a pasar a la acción: invitar a las personas a reconectar con la naturaleza en su forma más simple. A partir de ahí, trabajamos codo con codo para crear una expresión visual sobre la alienación que muchas personas sienten hacia la naturaleza, y ofrecer una invitación clara a embarcarnos en un viaje casi espiritual de vuelta a la Tierra. Tras acordar que incluso los efectos visuales tenían que parecer auténticos, le dimos al director Martin de Thurah total libertad creativa para experimentar con efectos prácticos de la vida real. Desafío a cualquiera que vea este vídeo a resistir la tentación de salir y reconectar con la naturaleza".

author: Iris Gonzales
title: PSE hopeful of better economic conditions this year | Philstar.com
text:
MANILA, Philippines — The operator of the local bourse is keeping its fingers crossed that better economic conditions would entice investors to return to the stock market this year.
"The expected improvement in macroeconomic indicators are poised to drive market conditions in 2024," said Philippine Stock Exchange (PSE) president and CEO Ramon Monzon.
For the most part, the local bourse was sluggish in 2023, closing the year down by 1.8 percent and wearing red on the last trading session with most gauges down.
Monzon, however, said there are reasons to be optimistic this year with the Philippines projected to lead the ASEAN region with the highest GDP growth in 2024 at 6.2 percent.
This compares to Vietnam's six percent, Indonesia's five percent, Malaysia' 4.6 percent, Thailand's 3.3 percent and Singapore's 2.5 percent based on ADB’s Asian Development Outlook.
Aside from economic growth, inflation is projected to slow this year to close to four percent from an average of 6.9 percent as of end-November 2023.
"The US Fed and BSP are expected to cut rates in 2024, which are currently at 5.25 percent to 5.50 percent and 6.5 percent, respectively.
For 2024, analysts project the PSE index (PSEi) at a range of 6,800 to 8,300 points.
"The expected rate cuts by the US Fed and the Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas as well as the Philippine government's aggressive spending on infrastructure projects, and continued increase in foreign investment pledges are expected to stimulate consumption, generate job opportunities, and encourage additional investment," Monzon said.
On the other hand, there are risks to the positive outlook including the potential impact of higher transport charges, electricity rates, and international oil prices.
For capital raising activities, the PSE expects six companies to go public with the full year capital raising forecast at P175 billion, around P40 billion of which will come from IPOs.
"We are expecting six initial public offerings (IPO) for the year, starting with the listing of Citicore Renewable Energy Corp.. Since no new REITs were added in 2023, we hope to see REIT IPOs make a comeback this year," Monzon said.
One awaited REIT or real estate investment trust listing is that of SM Prime Holdings, which could be the biggest REIT listing at a possible offering of $1 billion.

author: Sandeep Raghavan
title: Crime Rate: Crime rate down by 23% in the newly formed Annamayya district | Amaravati News - Times of India
text: TIRUPATI: The overall crime rate in the newly formed Annamayya district has come down by 23% in 2023 in comparison to the last year's crime rate.According to Annamayya district SP B Krishna Rao, the total number of cases registered in 2023 was 4920 as against the 6097 cases registered in 2022.The significant decrease in the overall crime rate can be attributed to advance collection of intelligence coupled with preventive and proactive policing. The new district has also seen a reduction in the crimes against women by 31.8%.While the property and bodily offences saw a decline, the district police wing maintained a strong vigil on traffic violations under the MV Act. About 89894 challans were issued and fine amounts totalling Rs.1.74 crore were collected from traffic violators.There was also a decline of 19.5% witnessed in the POCSO cases this year with only 37 cases booked this year against 46 cases registered last year.The district police wing invoked the PD Act against four seasoned offenders and invoked the Externment Act against five others this year.The conviction rate also considerably increased with about 1,680 cases convicted this year as against 1,161 cases last year.
